did.unittitle: Ruth A. Woodbury Collection of Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company Photographs, 1924-1925
did.origination:
Ruth A. Woodbury;
Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Views of the Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company building and its construction.

scopecontent.p: Includes photographs of the construction of the Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company factory, exterior views of the factory, and one 1924 photograph of a woman in the factory inspecting cloth. All photographs are attributed to N. L. Stebbins, Boston.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Ruth A. Woodbury Collection of Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company Photographs #6879 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Views of the Factory and Its Construction.
Item 1: Entrance to Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company building

scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image depicts the entrance to the Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company building in Salem, Mass., built in 1924. Probably the entrance to the offices. Photo taken Jan. 16, 1925. Copy A. 20.25 x 25.25 cm.

did.unittitle: Item 2: Entrance to Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company building

scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image depicts the entrance to the Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company building in Salem, Mass., built in 1924. Probably the entrance to the offices. Photo taken Jan. 16, 1925. Copy B. 20.5 x 24.75 cm.

did.unittitle: Item 3: Construction of Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company building

scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image depicts the construction of part of the Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company building in Salem, Mass., built in 1924. Workmen visible in front of partially constructed frame; Salem Harbor barely visible in background. 24.5 x 20.5 cm.

did.unittitle: Item 4: Cloth inspection, Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company

scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image depicts the cloth inspection room in the Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company building in Salem, Mass., built in 1924. Female employees in the foreground are inspecting cloth; more employees, both male and female, are engaged in folding or packaging material in the background. Photo taken Nov. 14, 1924. 24.5 x 20.5 cm.

did.unittitle: Item 5: View of Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company complex

scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image depicts a view of the entire Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company complex in Salem, Mass., built in 1924. The entrance is visible in the foreground; weave shed (?) and other manufacturing areas in background. Loaded horse-drawn wagon at freight entrance in foreground. Photo taken Jan. 16, 1925. Copy A. 24.75 x 20.5 cm.

did.unittitle: Item 6: View of Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company complex

scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image depicts a view of the entire Naumkeag Steam Cotton Company complex in Salem, Mass., built in 1924. The entrance is visible in the foreground; weave shed (?) and other manufacturing areas in background. Loaded horse-drawn wagon at freight entrance in foreground. Photo taken Jan. 16, 1925. Copy B. 24.75 x 20.5 cm.
